title: Tile Fragment with Mandragora Fruit and Leaves
description:
Fragment of polychromed tile with bold decoration of mandragora fruit and leaves. From a circular or semi-circular composition. Green, yellow, brown details in raised faience on white ground tinged with blue. 
Condition: Fragment, chipped at edges.

museum_location.name: Amarna Period, Martha A. and Robert S. Rubin Gallery, 3rd Floor
